query.prompt:

| English | Derived | Etymology | |---|---|---| | in | | | | the | | | | same | | | | way | | | | like | | | | ox | | | | that | | | | go | | | | yoke | | | | I | | | | go | | | | with | | | | that | | | | burden | | | | soul | | | | until | | | | the | | | | gentle | | | | teacher | | | | endure | | | | it | | |
